name: Zefix Movie
description:
Use the Zefix Movie app to learn About actors and the movies they play at. You can find A varity of movies and tv shows to guess from, with multiple levels of difeculty from famous and easy actors to hard to guess actors that only cinema fans will know, try our app and challenge your knowledge in the cinema and actors world and don't forget to have fun!

Our app is designed to help you learn and enjoy a quiz with a user experience that is very simple.
